p: Antioxidant activity of Gsp after digestion in vitro was measured according to the method proposed by Shim et al. ( 2012). Briefly, pepsin and trypsin reacted with proteins at 37°C water bath for 4 hr, respectively, adjusted pH to 7.0. Hydrolyzate was used for the determination of antioxidant capacity (DPPH, ABTS, and ˙OH) through the above method.
